description: Number of identity trees with 2-colored nodes.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
Index entries for sequences related to trees
maple: b:= proc(n, i) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, `if`(i<1, 0,      add(binomial(2*b(i-1$2), j)*b(n-i*j, i-1), j=0..n/i)))    end:a:= n-> `if`(n=0, 1, 2*b(n-1$2) -2*add(b(j-1$2)*b(n-j-1$2)        , j=1..n-1) -`if`(irem(n, 2, 'r')=0, b(r-1$2), 0)):seq(a(n), n=0..35);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 02 2013
mathematica: b[n_, i_] := b[n, i] = If[n==0, 1, If[i<1, 0, Sum[Binomial[2*b[i-1, i-1], j]*b[n-i*j, i-1], {j, 0, n/i}]]];a[n_] := If[n==0, 1, 2*b[n-1, n-1] - 2*Sum[b[j-1, j-1]*b[n-j-1, n-j-1], {j, 1, n-1}] - If[Mod[n, 2]==0, r=n/2; b[r-1, r-1], 0]];Table[a[n], {n, 0, 35}] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Mar 01 2016, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Jan 04 1999
